Html:
There are several links included in the wiki and other install instructions that don't work. Specifically, the CaptureTest link:

http://www.codeproject.com/cs/media/DirXVidStrm.asp?df=100&forumid=73014&

exp=0&select=1780522 which is a dead link. I found what I thought was the right project:

http://www.codeproject.com/KB/directx/DirectXCapture.aspx but there are no sources for the CaptureTest project. However, I have found a revised capture project that does have a camera test project sources in it, but not sure it is the right one:

http://www.codeproject.com/KB/directx/DirectXCaptureRefresh.aspx

Also, I have failed to get the ALVAR samplecamcalib executable to run without crashing, but cannot get access to the ARTag wrapper dll file mentioned in the docs to try using ARTag. Is it possible to get this if you aren't a Columbia student?

Yes, I have noticed the missing link for the direct show stuff recently. I need to discuss with my advisor about this issue, but he is still away. 

Anyone should be able to get ARTag, but I haven't touched ARTag for long time, so I don't know about the situation now.

Ohan
